metadata.description: 129 pages! In Neo Terra, a world that blends forgotten technology with natural magic, reckless young glide-wing pilot Billy Boom Boom must outwit the Pirate King to stop him from ushering in a new Dark Age. Camilla d'Errico pencils this high adventure mini-series about loyalty, friendship, and what it means to be a true hero. Collects SKY PIRATES OF NEO TERRA #1-5.
metadata.name: Sky Pirates of Neo Terra, Vol. 1
